statements: SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_contact FROM incoming_leads;
SELECT * FROM incoming_leads WHERE lead_status = 'New';
SELECT lead_name, lead_source, lead_date FROM incoming_leads ORDER BY lead_date DESC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_contact, lead_status FROM incoming_leads WHERE lead_source IS NOT NULL;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM incoming_leads WHERE lead_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM incoming_leads WHERE lead_status='New';
SELECT lead_name, lead_contact, lead_date FROM incoming_leads WHERE lead_status='New' ORDER BY lead_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM incoming_leads WHERE lead_status='New' ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(lead_id), lead_source FROM incoming_leads GROUP BY lead_source ORDER BY COUNT(lead_id) DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_contact FROM incoming_leads WHERE lead_source='Website' OR lead_source='Referral';
SELECT * FROM incoming_leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM incoming_leads WHERE lead_phone IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM incoming_leads ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone FROM incoming_leads WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(client_id) AS Total_Client_IDs, AVG(communication_id) AS Avg_Communication_IDs FROM client_communications;
SELECT * FROM incoming_leads WHERE lead_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT lead_email, lead_phone FROM incoming_leads WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT lead_name, created_at FROM incoming_leads ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(*) AS total_communications FROM client_communications GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT communication_type, communication_date FROM client_communications WHERE communication_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM Leads WHERE lead_source = 'Website';
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_phone FROM Leads ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email, agent_office FROM Agents WHERE agent_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone FROM Leads WHERE lead_source = 'Website';
SELECT agent_name, agent_email, agent_phone, agent_office FROM Agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;

SELECT lead_name, lead_email, communication_date, communication_type FROM Leads JOIN Communications ON Leads.lead_id = Communications.lead_id WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY communication_date ASC;

SELECT lead_name, agent_name, communication_date, communication_content FROM Leads JOIN Communications ON Leads.lead_id = Communications.lead_id JOIN Agents ON Communications.lead_id = Agents.agent_id WHERE agent_office = 'Main Office' ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone, lead_status FROM leads WHERE lead_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM communications ORDER BY comm_date DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email, agent_agency FROM agents;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_status='Converted';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM leads WHERE lead_source='Google' ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_id='12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef';
SELECT lead_name, COUNT(*) AS total_communications FROM leads l JOIN communications c ON l.lead_id = c.lead_id GROUP BY l.lead_name HAVING total_communications > 2;
SELECT p.property_address, a.agent_name FROM properties p JOIN agents a ON p.agent_id = a.agent_id WHERE p.property_price > 500000 ORDER BY p.property_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM leads WHERE lead_source = 'Website';
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_phone FROM leads ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT log_date, log_time, log_type, log_description FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC, log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE lead_id = 1;
SELECT agent_name, agent_phone FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone FROM leads WHERE lead_source = 'Website' ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY log_date, log_time DESC;
